text: ubusanzwe iyo mu kinyarwanda bavuze ngo umuntu ni umugabo byumvikana ko afite ibitekerezo bizima yihesha agaciro afite indangagaciro zo kwanga ikibi agashyira imbere icyiza bikaba akarusho noneho iyo koko ari umugabo wubatse wabyaye kuko aba atoza abe kugenza atyo

ubusanzwe iyo mu kinyarwanda bavuze ngo umuntu ni umugabo byumvikana ko afite ibitekerezo bizima yihesha agaciro afite indangagaciro zo kwanga ikibi agashyira imbere icyiza bikaba akarusho noneho iyo koko ari umugabo wubatse wabyaye kuko aba atoza abe kugenza atyo

minisiteri yuburinganire niterambere ryumuryango itangaza ko mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na cumi nakarindwi abangavu batewe inda imburagihe bataragira imyaka cumi numunani yamavuko bagera ku bihumbi cumi nabirindwi namaganatatu namirongo itatu nabarindwi naho mu mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na cumi numunani baba ibihumbi cumi nicyenda namagana inani namirongotatu nababiri.

mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na cumi nicyenda abazitewe barenga ibihumbi makumwabiri nabitatu mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na makumwabiriri imibare yabazitewe yerekana ko bagera ku bihumbi cumi nicyenda naho mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na makumwabiriri narimwe bageze ku bihumbi makumwabiri nabitatu
ubuhamya bwa bamwe mu bangavu batewe inda imburagihe bugaragaza ubunyamaswa bwabagabo bagiye babasambanya ku ngufu bakabatera inda bamwe batitaye ko bangana nabo babyaye

umwangavu wimyaka cumi nitandatu wo mu murenge wa muganza mu karere ka gisagara avuga ko yize mu mashuri abanza ageze mu wa kabiri avamo ajya gukora akazi ko mu rugo bitewe nubukene bwari mu rugo rwabo iwabo babyaye abana barindwi we ni imfura muri bo
mu buhamya bwe avuga ko yasambanyijwe numugabo wo mu rugo yakoragamo amufashe ku ngufu muri bibiri nacumi nakarindwi.
undi mwangavu wahaye ubuhamya igihe ni uwo mu karere ka kayonza yagaragaje ko yasambanywaga numwarimu umwigisha mu mashuri abanza mu mwaka wibihumbi bibiri nacumi numunani

ati masenge yamfataga nabi akanga ko ngira icyo mubwira ngo tuganire kuko iwacu twari abakeneubwo yari yarantegetse ko uwo mwarimu agomba kujya anyigisha isomo rya nimugoroba yanjyanaga mu nzu yo hanze aho acumbitse akansambanya

ati mu ishuri naramubonaga aje kutwigisha ngahahamuka nkarwara bagahita banjyana hanze noneho byageraga nimugoroba amasaha yo kujya kunyigisha ageze nkabura aho mpungira kuko yabaga yaraye ansambanyije yankomerekeje ntiyumvisha ukuntu agiye kongera agasubiza mu bisebe

undi mwangavu wo mu murenge wa musambira mu karere ka kamonyi avuga ko yatangiye gusamabanywa numugabo afite imyaka cumi nibiri icyo gihe yari umunyeshuri yiga mu mwaka wa kane wamashuri abanza yamusambanyaga abanje kumushukisha amafaranga

ati masenge yamfataga nabi akanga ko ngira icyo mubwira ngo tuganire kuko iwacu twari abakeneubwo yari yarantegetse ko uwo mwarimu agomba kujya anyigisha isomo rya nimugoroba yanjyanaga mu nzu yo hanze aho acumbitse akansambanya
uyu mukobwa avuga ko yageze aho arwara ihahamuka yabona uwo mwarimu agahungabana

ati mu ishuri naramubonaga aje kutwigisha ngahahamuka nkarwara bagahita banjyana hanze noneho byageraga nimugoroba amasaha yo kujya kunyigisha ageze nkabura aho mpungira kuko yabaga yaraye ansambanyije yankomerekeje ntiyumvisha ukuntu agiye kongera agasubiza mu bisebe
ibibazo yahuye nabyo yabiganirije umuforomo wo ku kigo nderabuzima aramuhumiriza amufasha kwiyakira ubu yamaze kubyara

undi mwangavu wo mu murenge wa musambira mu karere ka kamonyi avuga ko yatangiye gusamabanywa numugabo afite imyaka cumi nibiri icyo gihe yari umunyeshuri yiga mu mwaka wa kane wamashuri abanza yamusambanyaga abanje kumushukisha amafaranga
uwo mugabo yaje kumutera inda amwanduza virusi itera sida amaze kumenya ko atwite yahise amureka ndetse ntiyamufasha no kurera umwana
ati nta kintu yigeze amfasha kuko numwana atamwemeye kuri ubu nta nubwo tukivugana cyane kuko tudahuza
undi mukobwa wo mu karere ka gisagara yatewe inda mu mwaka wa bibiri na cumi na karindwi ananduzwa sida numugabo ubwo yakoraga akazi ko mu rugo mu mujyi wa kigali

ubwo yahuraga numunyamakuru wa igihe yari avuye ku kigo nderabuzima gufata ibiryo nimiti byumwana we kuko agaragaraho imirire mibi nibimenyetso byo kugwingira yamugaragarije ko abayeho mu buzima bushaririye

yagize ati aho nakoraga i kigali namenyanye numugabo wakoraga akazi ko kogosha yarambwiye ngo njye kumusura ngezeyo amfata ku ngufu antera inda nyuma naramushatse ndamubura aho nakoraga baranyirukana ngaruka mu rugo

umukobwa wimyaka cumi nine yamavuko wo mu murenge wa kitabi mu karere ka nyamagabe yahuye numunyamakuru wa igihe mu mwaka wa bibiri na mwaka wibihumbi bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe atwite inda nkuru yatewe imburagihe

avuga ko yafashwe ku ngufu numugabo utuye hakurya yiwabo mu mudugudu wa subukiniro amutera inda muri nzeri bibiri na makumyabiri na makumyabiri ubwo yari yagiye mu ishyamba kwahira ubwatsi bwamatungo icyo gihe yari umunyeshuri yiga mu mwaka wa gatanu wamashuri abanza
ati yansanze mu ishyamba aho nari ndi kwahira mbona ari kundebana umujinya arangije aramfata ni umugabo wari ushinzwe gucunga ibinyomoro ariko ndamuzi
uwo mugabo yaramusambanyije amwangiza nimyanya yibanga ibyo bikimara kuba yaratashye agira ubwoba bwo kubibwira ababyeyi be kuko ngo uwo mugabo wamusambanyije yari yamubwiye ko nabivuga azamwica
nyuma yaho yumvise akomeje kubabara mu gitsina abwira nyina ibyamubayeho na we ahita amujyana kwa muganga bamupimye basanga atwite
umugabo wimyaka mirongo itatu nirindwi nukomoka mu bwongereza ricky william lightfoot yegukanye umwanya wa mbere mu irushanwa rya man versus horse marathon
iri ni isiganwa ngarukamwaka ribera mu nzira zinzitane mu mihanda myiza no mu misozi amafarashi atwawe nabantu aba asiganwa ku ntera yibilometero mirongo itatu na bitanu nabantu bari kugenda namaguru

ricky yabaye uwa gatatu yegukanye iri rushanwa mu mateka yaryo kuva ryatangira mu mwaka wigihumbi kimwe na magana icyenda mirongo inani yavuze ko yamaze amasaha makumyabiri nicyenda adasinziriye mbere yuko ritangira
kuko muri iri siganwa abantu namafarasi bakoresha inzira zitandukanye ricky william yahishuye ko ubwo yageraga ku murongo wo gusorezaho atari azi ko ari we watsinze
yasize amafarashi mirongo itatu akoresheje amasaha abiri iminota makumyabiri nibiri namasegonda makumyabiri natatu
ifarashi yaje ku mwanya wa mbere william yayisize iminota ibiri
isiganwa ryaberaga mu gace ka llanwrtyd wells mu mujyi wa powys muri ecosse wales

geoffrey allen ni we munyamagaru waherukaga kuryegukana akoresheje amasaha abiri iminota mirongo itatu numwe namasegonda makumyabiri natandatu  mu gihe uwaryegukanye bwa mbere ari zoe white akoresheje amasaha abiri iminota irindwi namasegonda mirongo itatu natandati mu mwaka wa bibiri na kane
ricky william lightfoot yegukanye amayero ibihumbi bitatu na magana atanu nkigihembo nyamukuru
repubulika yabaturage yu bushinwa yohereje wang xuekun ngo ahagararire inyungu zicyo gihugu mu rwanda asimbuye ambasaderi rao hongwei uherutse gusoza inshingano ze

ambasaderi mushya wu bushinwa mu rwanda wang xuekun yakiriwe na minisitiri wububanyi namahanga nubutwererane dr biruta vincent amushyikiriza kopi zimpapuro zimwemerera guhagararira igihugu cye i kigali
minisitiri dr biruta na ambasaderi wang xuekun kandi bagiranye ibiganiro byibanze ku kurushaho guteza imbere ubufatanye numubano mwiza usanzwe hagati yibihugu byombi

amb rao hongwei uherutse gusoza inshingano zo guhagarira igihugu cye mu rwanda yari yazitangiye mu mwaka wa bibiri na cumi na karindwi mu bikorwa yakoze harimo gukomeza gushimangira umubano w ibihugu byombi no kwagura inzego bifatanyamo

ambasaderi mushya wu bushinwa mu rwanda wang xuekun yavutse mu gihumbi kimwe magana cyenda na mirongo itandatu numunani akaba afite impamyabushobozi yikirenga phd mu bijyanye na engineering abarizwa mu ishyaka rya communist party of china riri ku butegetsi muri icyo gihugu

ubwo yageraga i kigali ku nshuro ye ya mbere mu mpera za gicurasi bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri ari kumwe numuryango we amb wang yavuze ko ubwo azaba amaze guhabwa uburenganzira bwo guhagararira igihugu cye mu rwanda azashyira imbere kwagura umubano nubuhahirane hagati yimpande zombi

umubano wu rwanda nu bushinwa umaze igihe kirekire ushingiye ku bufatanye ubwubahane no gushyigikirana mu ugushyingo bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe nibwo hizihijwe imyaka mirongo itanu yumubano mwiza nubufatanye bwimpande zombi

ibihugu byombi bifatanya mu mishinga yishoramari ibikorwaremezo ikoranabuhanga ubucukuzi bwamabuye yagaciro ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere uburezi kubaka ubushobozi ubuzima ubucuruzi ubukerarugendo ubuhinzi umutekano nindi iteza urwa gasabo imbere

mu mwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri u bushinwa bwohereje mu rwanda ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni magana abiri na mirongo inani nebyiri zamadolari mu gihe ibyo u rwanda rwoherejeyo bingana na miliyoni mirongo itatu numunani na magana arindwi zamadolari ishoramari ryabwo ryageze kuri miliyoni makumyabiri neshatu nibihumbi cumi na bitandatu byamadolari rivuye kuri miliyoni cumi na zirindwi zamadolari yo muri bibiri na cumi nicyenda
mu bijyanye nibikorwaremezo u bushinwa ni bwo bwatanze inkunga nini mu kubaka imihanda myinshi mu rwanda bwafashije igihugu mu iyubakwa ryingana na mirongo irindwi ku ijana byiyo gifite

ikigo cyimisoro namahoro rra cyaciye abacuruzi mirongo itatu numwe amande ya miliyoni cumi numunani nibihumbi ijana na mirongo itatu na magana inani na cumi byamanyarwanda kubera kudakoresha neza ikoranabuhanga rya ebm

nubwo hakigaragara umubare munini wabacuruzi badakozwa ubu buryo bwo gukoresha ebm hakaba hari nababukoresha nabi ikigo cyigihugu cyimisoro namahoro rra gikomeza gushyiramo ingufu mu rwego wo kunoza imitangire yumusoro ku nyongeragaciro tva

mu itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na komiseri mukuru wikigo cyimisoro namahoro rra bizimana ruganintwali pascal rigaragaza urutonde rwabacuruzi nibihano kuri buri wese kubera kudakoresha neza ebm mu bucuruzi bwabo urutonde rwatangajwe kuwa cumi na gatatu kamena ibihumbi bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiriruriho abacuruzi makumyabiri na batatu batubahirije inshingano zo gukoresha ebm ndetse nabacuruzi umunani bakoze amakosa yo gutubya umusoro

abacuruzi makumyabiri na batatu batakoresheje inyemezabuguzi ya ebm umunani muri bo bahanishijwe amande yikubye kabiri umwe ahanishwa amande yikubye kane barindwi bahanishwa amande yikubye inshuro icumi nabandi barindwi bahanishwa amande yikubye inshuro makumyabiri byumusoro wose wari wanyerejwe

uwaciwe amande ari hejuru ni sosiyete yaciwe miliyoni enye nibihumbi magana ane byamafaranga yurwanda nyuma yo gukuba inshuro makumyabiri umusoro wari wanyerejwebivuze ko hanyerejwe amafaranga ibihumbi magana biri na makumyabiri na kimwe nijana na mirongo inani natandatu yamanyarwanda

ku ruhande rwabatubije umusoro bagatanga inyemezabuguzi zidahwanye nibyo abaguzi bakuye mu maduka harimo batanu bahanishijwe amande yikubye inshuro icumi ku musoro wari wanyerejweabandi batatu bahanishwa amande yikubye inshuro makumyabiri
amande yose yaciwe aba bacuruzi bagaragazwa na rra ni amafaranga asaga miliyoni cumi numunani zamafaranga yurwanda
muri bibiri na cumi na gatatu ni bwo mu rwanda hatangijwe gahunda yo gutanga inyemezabuguzi mu buryo bwikoranabuhanga ebm

rra igaragaza ko gushyira ahagaragara urutonde rwabacuruzi badakoresha neza ebm bigamije gukangurira abandi batazikoresha kurushaho kubyitabira cyane ko umucuruzi utayikoresha ahanwa hakurikijwe ibyo itegeko riteganya
mu bihumbi bibiri na cumi nicyenda hasohotse itegeko rigena ko nabantu batabaruye muri tva batangira gukoresha ebm mu bikorwa byabo bya buri munsi
rra kandi yakanguriye abaguzi bose gusaba inyemezabuguzi ya ebm ndetse bakibuka no kugenzura ko amafaranga bishyuye ahuye nayanditse ku nyemezabwishyu bahawe
ni ubutumwa bwatangiwe mu muhango wo gutangiza icyumweru cyuburezi mu mashuri yiri torero wabereye mu karere ka bugesera ku wa cumi na gatatu kamena bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri
icyumweru cyuburezi ni ubwa mbere giteguwe ku rwego rwa adepr ubuyobozi bwavuze ko hatekerejwe no ku kwagura ibikorwainzego zuburezi nubuvuzi zikarushaho gushyirwamo imbaraga
umushumba mukuru wungirije wa adepr pasiteri rutagarama eugne yavuze ko iri torero ryifuza kubaka uburezi bufite ireme atari ukugira amashuri ameze nkumutako

ati ni gahunda itari imenyerewe impinduka twifuza ntabwo zizareba urwego rumwe rwivugabutumwa hari nubumenyi bukenewe turi mu mavugurura niki twabonye ko ari ngombwa ntabwo twifuza kugira ibigo byimitako ahubwo bigomba kujyana nireme ryuburezi butangirwamo
turacyafite urugendo runini kugira ngo ibigo byacu bimere neza kandi ntitwabigeraho uruhare rwacu rutagaragaye nkitorero ndetse hatariho ubufatanye bwabayobozi bibigo ababyeyi nubuyobozi bwa leta
pasiteri rutagarama yashimye ubufatanye bwa leta na adepr mu byuburezi burimo kuba leta itanga imishahara yabarimu ubutaka bwo kwaguriraho ibikorwaremezo nibindi
umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wintara yiburasirazuba dr nyirahabimana jeanne yavuze ko uyu ari umusanzu ukomeye adepr izanye witezweho ibisubizo byibibazo bisanzwe bihari

ati igihe cyose uburezi bugiye gukorwaho nabantu batandukanye ni ibintu biduha umusaruro iyo turebye ibiteganyijwe gukorwa muri iki cyumweru cyuburezi turasanga hazaboneka ibisubizo byinshi byibibazo duhura na byo
ubuyobozi bwitorero rya pentekote mu rwanda adepr bwatangaje ko mu mavugurura bwatangiye harimo gushyira imbaraga mu bizamura imibereho yabaturage aho kwita ku ivugabutumwa gusa

mu bizakorwa harimo ubukangurambaga ku kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge ninda zitateguwe mu banyeshuri gusubiza mu ishuri abaritaye nibindi ku nsanganyamatsiko igira ati uburezi bufite ireme ishingiro ryiterambere rirambye

dr nyirahabimana yavuze ko ari ubukangurambaga bwunganira ubundi ubwo bufatanye bukaba ari bwo butanga umusaruro wuburezi bufite ireme yasabye adepr gukomeza muri uwo murongo yizeza ko leta na yo izakomeza gutanga umusanzu wayo

seneza jean paul uhagarariye umuryango uvuga ubutumwa bwiza mu rubyiruko binyuze muri siporo ambassadors football yavuze ko bidashoboka guteza imbere uburezi usize siporo inyuma ikaba ari yo mpamvu mu bigo byamashuri bya adepr hashyizwemo gahunda yo kwigisha umupira wamaguru
itorero adepr rifite ibigo byamashuri yincuke abanza nayisumbuye birenga magana atatu hirya no hino mu gihugu
urukiko rwubujurire mu bwongereza rwateye utwatsi icyifuzo cyabimukira nimiryango yasabaga ko batakoherezwa mu rwanda ni icyemezo kije gishimangira icyurukuru cyafashwe mu cyumweru gishize

ibi bisobanuye ko indege ya mbere izatwara abimukira izahaguruka kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki ya cumi nenye kamena bibiri na makumyabiri na kabirinkuko byari biteganyijwe urukiko rwavuze ko politiki yu bwongereza yo kohereza abimukira mu bindi bihugu ifite ishingiro kandi ari inyungu rusange

urukiko rwavuze ko abantu cumi numwe ari bo bashobora kurira indege ya mbere ibajyanye i kigali gusa umuryango care4calaisuri mu irwanya iyi gahunda wavuze ko abantu umunani ari bo bashobora kurira indege
mu cyumweru gishize abarwanya gahunda yo kohereza abimukira mu rwanda baratsinzwe kuko urukiko rukuru mu bwongereza rwemereye guverinoma yicyo gihugu kubikora

umubare wabagombaga kugenda ku ikubitiro waragabanutse kuko ku byari biteganyijwe ko bari mirongo itatu na barindwi ariko inzitizi zatanzwe zishingiye ku mategeko agenga abimukira nuburenganzira bwa muntu zituma bagabanuka

ku wa gatanu wicyumweru gishize hafashwe umwanzuro wo kutohereza abantu batandatu bari ku rutondeaba bakurikira abandi makumyabiri na bo barukuweho mu mpera ziki cyumweru ibi biratuma hasigara cumi numwe barimo bane bakomoka muri iran babiri bo muri albania umwe wo muri syria babiri bo muri iraq abandi ntihahishuwe ubwenegihugu

umwanditsi wa bbc mark easton avuga ko bishoboka ko umubare ushobora gukomeza kumanuka kugera kuri zero mbere yuko isaha yo guhaguruka kwindege igera ku wa gatanu abantu ijana na mirongo itatu bari bafite ubutumwa ko bashobora koherezwa mu rwanda

nubwo hakomeje inkundura yo kwirukana abimukira mu bwongereza ntibibuza abandi kwinjira kuko ku cyumweru abagera ku ijana na cumi numwe binjiye bajyanywe nubwato buto butatu mu gihe abarenga igihumbi ari bo binjiye muri uyu mwaka wose

u rwanda rwagiranye amasezerano nu bwongereza agena ko aba bimukira bazajya bafatwa bakazanwa mu rwanda ababishaka bagahitamo gusubira mu bihugu byabo mu gihe nabagaragaza ubushake bwo kurugumamo bafashwa kuhakomereza ubuzima

ku ikubitiro bwahaye u rwanda miliyoni ijana na makumyabiri zamayero azagirira akamaro izo mpunzi nabanyarwanda binyuze mu bikorwa byuburezi mu mashuri yisumbuye ayimyuga ndetse nandi mahugurwa mu masomo yubumenyingiro ibyo byiyongeraho ko bazafashwa kwiga kugera mu mashuri makuru na kaminuza

umuvugizi wungirije wa guverinoma yu rwanda alain mukuralinda aherutse kubwira igihe ko u rwanda rwamaze kwitegura kwakira aba bimukira kandi nibagera i kigali bazafatwa neza nkuko bigengwa namasezerano yo kubazana

ati icyiza ni uko twe mu rwanda rwiteguye uyu munsi ndagira ngo mare impungenge zuko niyo batubwira ngo haje 500 ba mbere abo twabakira ariko nkuko mubizi bazagenda baza mu byiciro kandi nta gutungurana kuzabamo

muri werurwe uyu mwaka byatangajwe ko zahabu yageze ku madolari ya amerika akabakaba mirongo inani kuri garama imwe imibare isatira iyo hejuru yigeze kubaho muri kanama 2020 ubwo icyorezo cya covid19 cyari cyarahagaritse ibikorwa byinshi mu nzego zinyuranye
nyuma yaho u burusiya bugabiye ibitero kuri ukraine impuguke mu byimari nubukungu zitangaza ko abashoramari bagerageje guhita bashaka ahantu bashora amafaranga yabo ku buryo baba bizeye
umutekano wayo nko gushobora mu byo kugura impapuro mvunjwafaranga ubucuruzi bwamadolari ndetse nubwa zahabu

bitewe nihindagurika ryibiciro rikomeza kugenda rifata indi ntera hirya no hino ku isi byitezwe ko ibihugu byinshi bikomeza gushakira ibisubizo mu kugura no kwigwizaho zahabu mu rwego rwo kwizera ko bifite ikintu cyagaciro mu gihe ibisigaye byose bigenda bigatakaza harimo nifaranga ubwaryo

statista yashyize ahagaragara urutonde rwibihugu bya afurika byari byibitseho zahabu nyinshi mu bubiko kugeza mu mwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe ku buryo mu bihe byihungabana ryubukungu nitakazagaciro ryifaranga ibyo bihugu bishobora kugira icyizere cyo kuzahura ubukungu no kurenga ibyo bihe byemye
ku mwanya wa mbere bibimburirwa na algeria ifite toni za zahabu zigera ku ijana na mirongo irindwi nenye

mu byo kugura impapuro mvunjwafaranga ubucuruzi bwamadolari ndetse nubwa zahabuku mwanya wa kabiri hazaho afurika yepfo ibarirwa toni ijana na makumyabiri neshanu igakurikirwa na libya ku mwanya wa gatatu na toni ijana na cumi na zirindwi mu gihe ku mwanya wa kane hazaho igihugu cya misiri na toni mirongo inani nibice mirongo irindwi nabitatu

maroc ifite toni makumyabiri nebyiri  bituma iba igihugu cya gatanu cyibitseho zahabu nyinshi muri afurika ku mwanya wa gatandatu ikurikirwa na nigeria ifite zahabu ipima toni 2137 ku mwanya wa karindwi hakaba mauritania ifite toni cumi nebyiri1244

imyanya itatu iheruka hariho ibihugu nka ghana ifite toni 874 ku mwanya wa munani igakurikirwa na tunisia ku mwanya wa cyenda aho ibarirwa toni 684 mu gihe ku mwanya wa 10 hariho igihugu cya mozambique gifite zahabu ingana na toni 394
u bwongereza bumaze igihe bukomerewe nikibazo cyabimukira binjira muri icyo gihugu mu buryo bunyuranyije namategeko banyuze mu nzira izwi nka english channel

english channel ni inzira yamazi itandukanya amajyepfo yu bwongereza namajyaruguru yu bufaransa iyi nzira yifashishwa cyane nabimukira binjira mu bwongereza bakoresheje amato mato mu buryo bunyuranyije namategeko
kuva umwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri watangira kugeza muri kanama uwo mwaka u bwongereza bwari bumaze kwakira abimukira ibihumbi bitatu magana acyenda na mirongo itanu banyuze muri english channel

byageze muri mata bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri u bwongereza bwugarijwe cyane niki kibazo cyabimukira kuko imibare yagaragaza ko uyu mwaka ushobora kurangira bwakiriye abimukira ibihumbi miringo itandato ugereranyije nabarenga gato ibihumbi makumyabiri numunani bwakiriye mu mwaka wa bibiri na makumyabiri na kabiri

umuvugizi wa guverinoma yu rwanda yolande makolo yibukije umuryango wabibumbye ko ibihugu byose bigira ubusugire bungana ashimangira ko ubushotoranyi bwa repubulika iharanira demokarasi ya congo rdc bukwiye guhagarara burundu

makolo yasubizaga imvugo yumuvugizi wumunyamabanga mukuru wumuryango wabibumbye stephane dujarric ku bibera muri repubulika iharanira demokarasi ya congo rdc wagaragaje ko iki gihugu gishotorwa kandi kivogerwa muri make yakigaragaje nkigihohoterwa gusa
dujarric yagize ati turongera gushimangira ko dushishikajwe nubusugire ubwigenge ubumwe ndetse nukutavogerwa kwa rdc kandi turamagana ibihugu byihisha inyuma yimitwe yitwaje intwaro
u rwanda rwahise rwibutsa ko bitari bikwiye gukomoza kuri rdc gusa ngo hirengagizwe ubushotoranyi ikomeje kurukorera ingabo ziki gihugu zimaze gutera ibisasu ku butaka bwu rwanda inshuro nyinshi

ku wa cumi nicyenda werurwe no ku wa makumyabiri na gatatu gicurasi bibiri na makumyabiri na kabirimu mirenge ya kinigi na nyange muri musanze nuwa gahunga muri burera ibisasu bya fardc byakomerekeje abantu byangiza nimitungo yabo

makolo yibukije dujarric ko ubusugire bwibihugu byose burangana yaba ubwu rwanda cyangwa ubwa rdc ubwo rdc yateraga ibisasu ku butaka bwu rwanda ntiyari yashotowe iki ni ikibazo gikomeye gifite ingaruka kandi kigomba guhagarara burundu

yakomoje kandi ku bufatanye bwa monusco ningabo za fardc ziyunze na fdlr nindi mitwe anenga kuba izi ngabo zumuryango wabibumbye zimaze imyaka irenga makumyabiri muri rdc zirebera ubu bufatanye bugamije kugera hafi yu rwanda ngo ruhungabanyirizwe umutekano
u rwanda ruherutse gutangaza ko fardc yivanze na fdlr ku buryo wagira ngo ni igisirikare kimwe bakora inama bagahuza gahunda yibyo bagiye gukora noneho monusco na yo ikaza ngo ije gushyigikira fardc
byageze aho uyu mukobwa aratoroka ava muri urwo rugo ajya kwa nyirakuru ariko aza gusanga atwite

hari kandi gushimuta abasirikare bu rwanda babiri bari ku burinzi byakozwe na fardc ifatanyije na fdlr ibi bikaba byaramenyeshejwe guverinoma ya rdc itsinda rishinzwe kugenzura uko imbibi zimipaka zubahirizwa ejvm nabandi
mu nshingano za monusco harimo kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro yose ariko yo ngo yahisemo kurwanya m makumyabiri na gatatu yonyine ifatanyije ningabo za rdc
imibare yo muri bibiri na makumyabiri yerekana ko muri uwo mwaka ingano yibikorwa byashibutse ku ishoramari ryu bushinwa ringana na miliyoni ijana na cumi nicyenda zamadolari
